overview: Alvinâ€™s relationship with Inez is fraught with many problems. Matters come to a head with the presence of another woman, Clara, who is getting intimate with Alvin. Then a spirit starts haunting Alvin and Inez, leading the latter to have a mental breakdown. Their best friends, Bayu and Amel, also share a similar experience when the spirit possesses Amel.
title: 12:00 AM
